ovdesc.p: IS.REALESTATE is the application to capture asset details related to Building as per customer requirement.

desc.p: This field is used to input the ID of the Customer. Valid input from the CUSTOMER application.
This field is used to input the Vendor who delivers or produces the asset. Valid input from the related IS.VENDOR application.
This field is used to input the CURRENCY in which Customer wants the Asset request Transaction to happen. Valid entry from the CURRENCY application.
This field is used to input the Unit Price of the Asset in Decimals.
This field refers to the Description of the Asset procured. Input should be in Alphanumeric.
This field refers to the Short Title of the Asset procured. Input should be in Alphanumeric.
This field refers to the type of Property (Ex. USED or NEW).
This field refers to the year of construction of the building.
This field refers to the total area of the property in specification.
This field refers to the reference Code of the Builder who agreed for Construction of the property.
This field refers to the Name of the Builder.
This field refers to the Number of Rooms of the Property in Construction.
This field refers to the Usage of the Property (Ex. Residential or Commercial).
This field refers to the Title Deed Date of the Property.
This field refers to the Title Deed number of the Property.
Start date of the encumbrance certificate.
Expiry date of the encumbrance certificate.
This field refers to the place of issue of EC.
This field refers to the Purchase Reference of the Asset. This field is automatically updated during authorisation of Purchase transaction. This is a Noinput field.
